abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include: (a)
            provision of inputs including fertilizer and improved maize
            seeds, transport, distribution and sales services and
            storage facilities for inputs; (b) development of improved
            extension training and research facilities; (d) development
            of road and drinking water infrastructure; and (e) technical
            assistance in support of the above activities. The major
            risks of the Project are related to: (i) administration and
            organization; (ii) provision of funds by Government; and
            (iii) transport and distribution of inputs.
